info.title: Luiz Victor Tinini
info.description:
🌐 LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/luizvictortinini/

\

💻 GitHub: https://github.com/luizvictortinini

\

📸 Instagram: https://instagram.com/luizvictortinini

\

📧 Email: luiz.tinini@exemplo.com

\
\

🛠️ About

\

Experience: Architect of a critical flow of a distributed application in a microservices architecture.

\

Focus: Architect / Tech Lead / Senior Developer

\

🚀 Technologies with Extensive Knowledge:

\

☕ Java 21, 🛡️ Kotlin, 🌱 Spring Boot, ☁️ Azure, 📦 Kubernetes, 🍃 MongoDB, 🐘 PostgreSQL, 🦉 Oracle, 📬 RabbitMQ, 🚀 Redis

\

📚 Technologies for Small Projects and Occasional Study:

\

🐍 Python, 🐹 Go, 🐘 PHP, ☁️ AWS, ⚙️ Jenkins, 🅰️ Angular, 📱 Android (Native)

\

🎓 Degrees:

\

Postgraduate in Software and Solutions Architecture; Studying Cybersecurity and Data Governance.

\

🌟 Personal Characteristics:

\

Throughout my life, curiosity has been my main drive, pushing me to continuously explore and learn.

\

In the world of technology, I believe anything is possible, as long as the risks are aligned with the stakeholders. This optimistic mindset drives my daily work.

\

I see architecture not as good or bad, but as efficient when it meets business requirements. Efficiency is the key measure.

\

Choosing a technology goes beyond current trends. A careful analysis of multiple factors is essential for making informed decisions about languages and frameworks.
